{"blocks":[{"key":"5tget","text":"Assemble an embedding mold secured to a breadboard that will be used to embed delipidated mouse brains in agarose blocks. After assembly, each chamber in the mold can hold a single brain, which can then be filled with molten agarose solution. After the agarose solution hardens, the mold will be disassembled to remove the hardened agarose blocks containing the brains.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cr6ju","text":"Degassing is successful if there are no visible bubbles inside the agarose solution. Recap vial and leave vial in the   vacuum oven with door closed and vacuum off.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":118,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7aj0d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5t3d","text":"If air bubbles are still present inside agarose solution, repeat the degassing process from step 6.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7pf5g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8t4io","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"596q2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"80","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e6pve","text":"The vacuum setting on the vacuum oven will remain off for the rest of the protocol after the degassing is successfully completed in this step. {"blocks":[{"key":"3421j","text":"Remove any small bubbles that form in the agarose solution in the mold with a P-200 manual pipette. Keep the brain centered in the embedding chamber as the agarose hardens.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1faju","text":"Immediately after placing the brain into the embedding chamber, remove the vial of agarose from the vacuum oven and pour a second layer of agarose solution into the embedding chamber.
